How to set custom bitrates on firmware 1.5.1 in autoexec.ash. See the bitrate_mod directory for an example.

To set a custom bitrate for a resolution do:
writew [address] [bitrate]

ex:
writew 0xA063B7DE 0x42AC
makes 3840x2160 30p high quality setting encode at 90mbs

bitrates (you can pick values in between or above these for fine tuning):
0x4190 18mbs
0x41F0 30mbs
0x4210 36mbs
0x4220 40mbs
0x4234 45mbs
0x4270 60mbs
0x4284 70mbs
0x4298 80mbs
0x42AC 90mbs
0x42C0 100mbs
0x42D4 110mbs
0x42E8 120mbs
0x42FC 130mbs
0x4306 140mbs
0x4310 150mbs
0x431A 160mbs

(120mbs works if your card is fast enough, the camera crashes if 150mbs is used 
for more than like 3 seconds. If you want to properly test if your card can 
handle a bitrate you need to test for more than a few minutes preferably 
recording lots of motion. If you get a slow sd card error it means your sd card 
is too slow and that the camera stopped recording for a few seconds in order to 
catch up)


addresses for high quality bitrate (+0x10 = medium, +0x20 = low):

NTSC:
0xA063B7DE 3840x2160 30P 16:9
0xA063B80E 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA063B83E 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super
0xA063B86E 2976x2976 30P 1:1
0xA063B89E 2688x2688 30P 1:1
0xA063B8CE 2704x1520 60P 16:9
0xA063B8FE 2704x1520 30P 16:9
0xA063B92E 2704x1520 48P 16:9
0xA063B95E 2704x1520 24P 16:9
0xA063B98E 2704x1520 30P 16:9 super
0xA063B9BE 2704x2032 30P 4:3
0xA063B9EE 2560x1920 30P 4:3
0xA063BA1E 2560x1440 60P 16:9
0xA063BA4E 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA063BA7E HDR 2560x1440 30P 16:9
0xA063BAAE 2304x1296 30P 16:9
0xA063BADE 1920x1440 60P 4:3
0xA063BB0E 1920x1440 30P 4:3
0xA063BB3E 1920x1440 48P 4:3
0xA063BB6E 1920x1440 24P 4:3
0xA063BB9E 1920x1080 60P 16:9
0xA063BBCE 1920x1080 60P 16:9 super
0xA063BBFE 1920x1080 45P 16:9
0xA063BC2E 1920x1080 40P 16:9
0xA063BC5E 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA063BC8E 1920x1080 30P 16:9 super
0xA063BCBE HDR 1920x1080 30P 16:9
0xA063BCEE 1920x1080 60I 16:9
0xA063BD1E 1440x1080 60P 16:9
0xA063BD4E 1440x1080 30P 16:9
0xA063BD7E 1440x1080 60I 16:9
0xA063BDAE 1600x1200 60P 4:3
0xA063BDDE 1600x1200 30P 4:3
0xA063BE0E 1440x1080 30P 4:3
0xA063BE3E 1600x900 30P 16:9
0xA063BE6E 1280x720 60P 16:9
0xA063BE9E 1280x720 60P 16:9 super
0xA063BECE 1280x720 30P 16:9
0xA063BEFE 848x480 60P 16:9
0xA063BF2E 848x480 30P 16:9
0xA063BF5E 848x480 30P 16:9 super
0xA063BF8E 848x480 60P 16:9 super
0xA063BFBE 720x480 60P 16:9
0xA063BFEE 720x480 30P 4:3
0xA063C01E 1280x960 60P 4:3
0xA063C04E 1280x960 30P 4:3
0xA063C07E 960x540 30P 16:9
0xA063C0AE 640x360 30P 16:9
0xA063C0DE 640x480 60P 4:3
0xA063C10E 640x480 30P 4:3
0xA063C13E 432x240 60P 16:9
0xA063C16E 432x240 30P 16:9
0xA063C19E 320x240 30P 4:3
0xA063C1CE 352x240 30P 4:3
0xA063C1FE 2560x1440 50P 16:9
0xA063C22E 1920x1080 48P 16:9
0xA063C25E 1920x1080 24P 16:9
0xA063C28E 1920x1080 15P 16:9
0xA063C2BE 1600x1200 48P 4:3
0xA063C2EE 1600x1200 24P 4:3
0xA063C31E 1280x960 48P 4:3
0xA063C34E 1280x960 24P 4:3
0xA063C37E 1280x720 48P 16:9
0xA063C3AE 1280x720 24P 16:9
0xA063C3DE 848x480 48P 16:9
0xA063C40E 848x480 24P 16:9
0xA063C43E 640x480 48P 4:3
0xA063C46E 640x480 24P 4:3
0xA063C4CE 1920x1080 120P 16:9
0xA063C4FE 1920x1080 120P 16:9 super
0xA063C52E 1920x1080 100P 16:9
0xA063C55E 1280x720 240P 16:9
0xA063C58E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA063C5BE 1280x720 120P 16:9
0xA063C5EE 1280x720 120P 16:9 super
0xA063C61E 848x480 240P 16:9
0xA063C64E 848x480 120P 16:9
0xA063C67E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA063C6AE 848x480 120P 16:9 super
0xA063C6DE 640x480 240P 4:3
0xA063C70E 640x480 120P 4:3
0xA063C73E 432x240 240P 16:9
0xA063C76E 432x240 120P 16:9
0xA063C79E 320x240 120P 4:3
0xA063C7CE 1280x960 120P 4:3
0xA063C7FE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super

PAL:
0xA063B7DE 3840x2160 25P 16:9
0xA063B80E 3840x2160 24P 16:9
0xA063B83E 3840x2160 24P 16:9 super

0xA063C16E 432x240 25P 16:9

0xA063C58E 1280x720 200P 16:9
0xA063C5BE 1280x720 100P 16:9
0xA063C5EE 1280x720 100P 16:9 super
0xA063C61E 848x480 200P 16:9
0xA063C64E 848x480 100P 16:9
0xA063C67E 848x480 90P 16:9 super
0xA063C6AE 848x480 100P 16:9 super
0xA063C6DE 640x480 200P 4:3
0xA063C70E 640x480 100P 4:3
0xA063C73E 432x240 200P 16:9
0xA063C76E 432x240 100P 16:9
0xA063C79E 320x240 100P 16:9
0xA063C7CE 1280x960 100P 4:3
0xA063C7FE 1920x1080 90P 16:9 super


The resolution/bitrate table is located in /dev/mtdblock1 at position 
0x0053B7D8. This entire partition gets loaded into memory at boot at offset 
0xA0100000.
